title: Perform a Mid-Day Cash Pickup
description: A POS terminal has accumulated too much cash, and a manager needs to perform a cash pickup to move excess funds to the safe.

tasks.description: Log into the POS terminal with manager credentials and initiate a 'Cash Pickup' transaction.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager starts the secure cash management function.

tasks.description: Enter the amount of cash being removed from the drawer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager accurately records the amount being transferred.

tasks.description: Complete the transaction, which prints a slip. The manager takes the cash and the slip to the back office to deposit in the safe.
tasks.expected_outcome: The cash is securely removed from the POS, and the terminal's balance is updated.
